name: Quallet
description:
Quallet is a game where you are a criminal in the land of Qualle, you steal things like planes to money from a bank, but watch out for the police!

In Quallet, you are Nalim, a criminal that wants to get rid of the police in Qualle. But it won't be easy.

In the game, you can enter free play mode after completing all missions. In free play mode, you can go to the club and help people on the street, like beggars, but before you do that, you need to complete missions by stealing planes, killing people and of course raiding the military base.

In Quallet, there are 6 very difficult missions. Quallet also has multiplayer support, where the second player can use a USB controller. There are lots of things to do in the land of Qualle!
